participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

neighborhood_crime_y.Description: My neighborhood is safe from crime. | 1 = Strongly Disagree; 2 = Disagree; 3 = Neutral (neither agree nor disagree); 4 = Agree; 5 = Strongly Agree

neighborhood_po_y.Description: Has a police officer ever provided assistance, protection, or any other service to you? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

neighborhood_po_times_y.Description: How many times has this happened to you in the past year? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4 or more times

neighborhood_po_exp_y.Description: Have you ever had a negative or bad experience with police? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

neighborhood_po_phy_y.Description: Has a police officer ever been physically aggressive towards you, including grabbing or pushing you aggressively? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

neighb_po_phy_times_y.Description: How many times has this happened to you in the past year? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4 or more times

neighb_po_used_slur_y.Description: Has a police officer ever been aggressive towards you in a non-physical way or used racial or ethnic or other slurs towards you? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

neighb_po_slur_times_y.Description: How many times has this happened to you in the past year? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4 or more times

neighb_po_stopped_y.Description: Have you ever been stopped by a police officer for no clear reason? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

neighb_po_stopped_times_y.Description: How many times has this happened to you in the past year? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4 or more times

neighb_po_arrested_y.Description: In the last 2 years, how many times have you been arrested by the police? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3 or more times

neighb_po_service_y.Description: Has a police officer ever provided assistance, protection, or any other services to a close friend or family member? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 999 = I don't know

neighb_po_service_times_y.Description: How many times has this happened to a close friend or family member in the past year? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4 or more times

neighb_po_fam_friend_exp_y.Description: Has a close friend or family member ever had a negative or bad experience with police? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No; 999 = I don't know

neighb_po_fam_friend_phy_y.Description: Has a police officer ever been physically aggressive towards a close friend or family member, including grabbing or pushing them aggressively? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

neighb_po_fam_friend_times_y.Description: How many times has this happened to a close friend or family member in the past year? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4 or more times

neighb_po_exp_slur_y.Description: Has a police officer ever been aggressive towards a close friend or family member in a non-physical way or used racial or ethnic or other slurs towards them? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

neighb_po_exp_slur_times_y.Description: How many times has this happened to a close friend or family member in the past year? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4 or more times

neighb_po_stopped_2_y.Description: Has a close friend or family member ever been stopped by a police officer for no clear reason? | 1 = Yes; 0 = No

neighb_po_stopped_times_2_y.Description: How many times has this happened to a close friend or family member in the past year? | 0 = 0; 1 = 1; 2 = 2; 3 = 3; 4 = 4 or more times

neighb_po_community_y.Description: I trust the police in my community: | 0 = Not at all; 1 = A little; 2 = Somewhat; 3 = Usually; 4 = Almost always

neighb_po_fair_y.Description: The police treat individuals fairly in my community: | 1 = Almost never; 2 = Sometimes; 3 = Often; 4 = Almost always

neighb_po_respect_y.Description: The police treat people with respect in my community: | 1 = Almost never; 2 = Sometimes; 3 = Often; 4 = Almost always

neighb_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1 = RA-Administered; 2 = Youth Self-Administered; 3 = Combination
